story:
Once upon a time, in the vast desert of Sudan, there lived a little camel named Salma. Salma was known for her kind heart and adventurous spirit. She loved to explore the golden sand dunes and watch the twinkling stars in the night sky.

One evening, as the sun dipped below the horizon, Salma gathered her fellow camel friends around a crackling campfire. The wise old camel, Grandpa Zaki, smiled and said, "Tonight, I will tell you a special bedtime story."

Grandpa Zaki's soothing voice filled the desert air as he began the tale of a magical oasis hidden deep within the desert. He described the shimmering pool of water surrounded by lush palm trees and colorful flowers, where exotic birds sang melodious tunes.

Salma and her friends listened in awe as Grandpa Zaki recounted the adventures of a brave young camel who embarked on a journey to find the oasis and discovered the true meaning of friendship and courage along the way.

As the story came to an end, the night sky was ablaze with twinkling stars casting a mystical glow over the desert. Salma and her friends felt a sense of wonder and contentment, knowing that even in the vastness of the desert, they were surrounded by love and magic.

Snuggled up in their cozy sand dune beds, the camels drifted off to sleep, their dreams filled with visions of the enchanted oasis and the joy of camaraderie under the vast Sudanese sky.

And so, under the watchful gaze of the moon and stars, Salma and her friends slept peacefully, knowing that tomorrow would bring new adventures and endless possibilities in the enchanting desert of Sudan.

Goodnight, little one. Sweet dreams under the desert sky, where magic and wonder never fade.
